DOC.brief_summary: Is it possible to do a panretinal photocoagulation for proliferative diabetic retinopathy in a single session using low fluence parameters?
DOC.brief_title: Panretinal Photocoagulation for Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy in a Single Session Using Low Fluence Parameters
DOC.criteria: untreated Proliferative diabetic retinopathy Previous photocoagulation
